content: How do I set up default locations for incoming parts?
According to **Inventory Management > Parts > Default Locations**, navigate to: Inventory → Parts → Select Part → Default Locations tab. Click 'Add', choose your location, then Save.
Show me an API example to fetch open sales orders.

Use GET `/api/v1/salesOrder?status=open`. Example:
```
curl -X GET \
  'https://your-fishbowl-server/api/v1/salesOrder?status=open' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer <token>'
```
